senses.sense_definition: A visual disturbance characterized by shimmering, zigzagging lines or lights, often resembling a fortification wall, which typically occurs as a warning sign before a migraine headache.

examples.text: The patient described a sudden episode of <w>teichopsia</w> where bright, jagged lines obscured part of her vision.
Although the headache had not yet started, the <w>onset of teichopsia</w> warned him that he needed to take his medication immediately.
